posts.title: Pepper Spray Bracelet
posts.content: Feel safe when you’re strolling down the mean streets by strapping on this pepper spray bracelet. This handy accessory can be used up to three feet away and features a sleek and slim minimalist style that’s discreet and comfortable!

posts.title: 24K Gold Facial Mask
posts.content: Appear more radiant than ever by giving your skin the Midas touch with this 24K gold facial mask. This affordable and luxurious facial mask is made from a blend of soothing ingredients that are designed to help reduce the appearance of wrinkles.

posts.title: Go The Fuck To Sleep Kid’s Book
posts.content: Go The Fuck To Sleep is a children’s book for grown ups, a hilarious take on tired parents who just want their damn kids to go to sleep. Seriously kids, go the fuck to sleep already, we’ve got to go to work early in the morning tommorow.

posts.title: GoPro Dog Harness
posts.content: See the world through your pup’s eyes by gearing him up with the GoPro dog harness and letting him loose. This customized harness comfortably straps on to your furry friend while allowing you to mount multiple GoPros so you can capture several different angles.

posts.title: Guitar Smartphone Clip
posts.content: Never again miss the lyrics or notes to the song you’re playing by keeping the guitar smartphone clip attached while you perform. This nifty tool accommodates both acoustic and electric guitars, and adjusts to fit all brands of smartphones – even if they’re in bulky cases.

posts.title: Guitar Wing Wireless 3D Controller
posts.content: Elevate your musical performance to face melting levels by attaching the guitar wing wireless 3D controller to your mighty axe. It allows you to instantly access and control a variety of digital effects for a truly unique sound the fans will go crazy for.

posts.title: Bluetooth Smart Padlock
posts.content: Lost your keys? It’s no problem at all when you’ve got this Bluetooth smart padlock. It features a sturdy all-weather casing, military-grade Bluetooth authentication and encryption, and uses your smartphone to unlock itself.

posts.title: Hot & Spicy Cinnamon Oreos
posts.content: Place a new twist on an old favorite by trying these delectable hot and spicy cinnamon Oreos. This piquant variety replaces the traditional white filling with a creamy cinnamon flavored filling that perfectly complements the savory chocolate cookies.

posts.title: Minecraft Torch
posts.content: Keep the hostile bad guys from spawning in your blocky abode by producing level 14 light with the Minecraft torch. The torch is both decorative and functional as its an officially licensed Minecraft product that can be mounted on the wall and/or serve as a light source.

posts.title: Water Filtering Showerhead
posts.content: Improve the health of your skin by cutting out 99% of chlorine and chemicals using this water filtering shower head. Apart from filtering your bath water, it features five powerful spray settings and comes in an elegant chrome finish.

posts.title: Smart Outlet Plug
posts.content: Control the flow of electricity in your home like never before using the Zuli smartplug! This futuristic outlet adapter allows you to customize, configure, and control with extreme precision any plugged in device using just your smartphone.

posts.title: Gibson Memory Cable
posts.content: Record an impromptu jam session as it happens without having to venture into the studio with the Gibson memory cable.  The cable boasts a battery life of up to 8 hours and is capable of storing an incredible 13 hours of audio.
